item.title: Hugo Test Post
item.description: Ethan Farmer (person) Description Absolute fucking idiot. History Born in England, grew up in Australia. Has a brother who has been described as a ‘stumpy-footed culinary t-rex’ Notes Was responsible for bringing the food-harvesting dough-bag known as Murray into Australia.
